title: Marking the Final Special Edition, New 2022 Ford GT LM Celebrates Ford’s Le Mans-Winning Heritage
description: Celebrating America’s only Le Mans-winning supercar that delivered victories 50 years apart – including an epic 1-2-3 victory in 1966 – the 2022 Ford GT LM Edition honors the car’s global race-winning success as the final special edition for the third-generation Ford GT.
